Description:
Detects when a Microsoft Cloud App Security reported when an activity occurs from a location that wasn't recently or never visited by any user in the organization.

Author: Austin Songer @austinsonger
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Activity from Infrequent Country
Query: sourcetype='m365-threat_management' eql select * from _source_ where eventsource = 'securitycompliancecenter' and eventname = 'activity from infrequent country' and status = 'success'
